https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/d9mz9mPuPHyQtuCgr4XxRLQLIlN.jpg Cold War on Ice, produced by 51-time Emmy Award-winner Ross Greenburg, chronicles the historic 27-day Summit Series in September of 1972 between a team of NHL All-Stars from Canada and the Soviet National Team during the height of the Cold War. Cold War on Ice: Summit Series '72
